Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory77.jpg'}
{3: 'Hordes of Corrupted are swarming towards her direction. Vera shuts the entrance tight and activates the defense facilities by herself.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Gunfire relentlessly assaults the location, while Vera slays enemy after enemy with her blades.'}
{3: 'Though Vera is a Support-type Construct, not made for combat, the battle skills she possesses are second to none.'}

{3: 'With her combat techniques, Vera slices through her enemies one by one, forcing the Corrupted to give her their full attention. Like a true Goddess of Death, she rips apart countless of these beings that brought her so much pain.'}
{3: 'Everything she despises begun from the Punishing Virus, and these Corrupted are the perfect scapegoats.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's all your fault! All your fault!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'One Corrupted, two Corrupted... After a short killing spree, Vera realizes that this battle site is not at all like what she expected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'There are way too few enemies here. Did they relocate to another city? But surely, at present, there are no other locations that require these forces.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Or did they get split up on the way?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "The Corrupted rarely move in an organized fashion. Instead, they simply gravitate to wherever humans are. It's therefore quite possible for some of them to get separated from their group.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But even so, these can't be the only ones remaining.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera comes to the conclusion that someone has diverted the attention of the Corrupted and led them elsewhere.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Is this your doing, Average Joe?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera turns on her comms to speak to the rest of her squad. Judging from what she can see, they're the only ones with any mobility left.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: 'Come on, Average Joe is such a mean nickname...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ugh, so it really was you? Those were supposed to be my targets!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: "I'm just lessening your load. It took us a while to decide to stay and defend the place with you, so you'd better appreciate it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I never said you could do that!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: 'Hah... Cough...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Judging from the intermittent signals, the others are in trouble. Vera rushes towards the other exit of the city where most of the Corrupted are.'}
{3: 'Her squadmates are now bearing the pain that was supposed to be hers alone.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: "I knew the terrain is terrible for us, but I didn't expect it to be this bad...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When Vera arrives, most of the squad members have perished. Only a few are barely hanging on.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hey! Average Joe!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: '...Eh, call me whatever you like...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Vera charges over and instantly takes out several Corrupted which are congregating on the Constructs. This, however, merely buys them a small window before the next batch comes.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: "I was hoping to prove to everyone during the rescue that you don't deserve being called Death... but hey, looks like you're not getting rid of that title any time soon.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: 'You bring death to your allies... and to your enemies too...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Not my problem! It's the problem of the rest of you for being too weak!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: 'Just leave us, Vera...', 4: '2'}
